title: Samsung Galaxy A53 5G Hands-On: Flipping the iPhone SE 3 approach
content:
Samsung recently unveiled a pair of mid-tier phones — the Galaxy A53 5G and the Galaxy A33 5G. The better of the two devices, the Galaxy A53 seemed positioned to take on the just-launched iPhone SE 3 (2022). While Apple’s mid-ranger prioritized giving consumers a flagship-level chip while compromising on things like display technology and

The post Samsung Galaxy A53 5G Hands-On: Flipping the iPhone SE 3 approach appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung's new mid-tier Galaxy A53 5G phone competes directly against the iPhone SE 3 in North America at the mid-tier price range
